title: LAG LAG LAG
body:
{{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}}
Ever since 2 weeks ago, I have been getting this random ping spikes that range from 100 - 2000 ping and when I check the task manager to see what could be the problem, I only see League being on. I'm not sure if this is because of League and its new content or what. I have been trying to figure out the problem ever since and still experiencing this ungodly ping spikes. I hope you can help me figure out the source of the problem so I can get back on the rift. And yes I know you aren't the tech support, but I just want to make sure just in case.

replies.body: It sounds like your network might experiencing packet loss here.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) when you get a chance to get an overview of your specific issue, and let me know what you find.
I got a score of 0, is that really bad?

Can you toss me some more info/screnshot?  There should be a better breakdown and analysis.  You can also run a traceroute to the game server too.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and trace it to 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes, remove the IP on the first two rows, and let me know what you find.
so you want me to send a screenshot of the networklog?

You don't have to, but generally below the score you should also get a graph of details showing an analysis of your network throughout the match.  A score of 0 suggests a possible issue with that log or something seriously wrong.  Based on that, you might have a firewall setting or something else getting in the way.  Beyond the log reader and running a traceroute, here are a couple of steps you can try out:

- Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure firewall settingts.
- Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities with your network strength and settings.

Run through those in a custom game and let me know how it works out.
I think the HRT worked, thanks for the help Porocles, also nice profile pic btw
